Quote.Author: Bella Thorne
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that everyone has the power to make a change in the world

Quote.Author: Bella Thorne
Quote.QuoteValue: Dancing inspires my music. Having your girlfriends all together and just being free and happy

Quote.Author: Bella Thorne
Quote.QuoteValue: I like clean-cut, very proper, very elegant looks

Quote.Author: Bella Thorne
Quote.QuoteValue: I love Michael Kors! I also love Miu Miu shoes - they're fabulous, I have so many pairs

Quote.Author: Bella Thorne
Quote.QuoteValue: I was never a dancer before 'Shake It Up'

Quote.Author: Bella Thorne
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think people realize how much work it takes to make an album

Quote.Author: Ben Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I find forgiveness to be really healthy

Quote.Author: Ben Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: People of similar political persuasions tend to flock together

Quote.Author: Ben Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in a home environment where I wasn't getting esteem for anything I did

Quote.Author: Ben Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: If I ever woke up with a dead hooker in my hotel room, Matt would be the first person I'd call

Quote.Author: Ben Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like fame is wasted on me

Quote.Author: Ben Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage hasn't been my thing. But gay people, knock yourselves out!

Quote.Author: Ben Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: All I do, really, is go to work and try to be professional, be on time and be prepared

Quote.Author: Ben Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm human, just like anybody else

Quote.Author: Ben Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: One guy told me I was a great actor, I just would never be on the cover of a magazine

Quote.Author: Ben Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the most loathsome man in the world. I've dropped to number nine

Quote.Author: Ben Barnes
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in that kind of pragmatic career ladder stuff

Quote.Author: Ben Barnes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not that kind of Bob Dylan, tortured creative

Quote.Author: Ben Barnes
Quote.QuoteValue: Half my fan mail comes from Japan

Quote.Author: Ben Barnes
Quote.QuoteValue: Sword fighting is just as fun as it looks on the screen

Quote.Author: Ben Barnes
Quote.QuoteValue: I would like to work with whoever would like to have me

Quote.Author: Ben Barnes
Quote.QuoteValue: I only remember the end of my dreams, like waking up at a steering wheel, or falling

Quote.Author: Ben Barnes
Quote.QuoteValue: Jeff Bridges is one of my favorite actors in the history of ever

Quote.Author: Ben Barnes
Quote.QuoteValue: There are plenty of people in the world who have tried to be rock stars and have not gotten there

Quote.Author: Ben Barnes
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't have any pets growing up

Quote.Author: Ben Barnes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not really an animal person

Quote.Author: Ben Bernanke
Quote.QuoteValue: How much would you pay to avoid a second Depression?

Quote.Author: Ben Bernanke
Quote.QuoteValue: In fact, the world needs more nerds

Quote.Author: Ben Bernanke
Quote.QuoteValue: Monetary policy is not a panacea

Quote.Author: Ben Bernanke
Quote.QuoteValue: A little humility never hurts

Quote.Author: Ben Bernanke
Quote.QuoteValue: You want to put the fire out first and then worry about the fire code

Quote.Author: Ben Bernanke
Quote.QuoteValue: Aggregate statistics can sometimes mask important information

Quote.Author: Ben Bernanke
Quote.QuoteValue: Identity theft is a serious crime that affects millions of Americans each year

Quote.Author: Ben Bernanke
Quote.QuoteValue: If two people always agree, one of them is redundant

Quote.Author: Ben Bernanke
Quote.QuoteValue: The Federal Reserve cannot solve all the economy's problems on its own

Quote.Author: Ben Bernanke
Quote.QuoteValue: Community development has a long history of innovation and learning from experience

Quote.Author: Ben Carson
Quote.QuoteValue: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams

Quote.Author: Ben Carson
Quote.QuoteValue: So after a while, if people won't accept your excuses, you stop looking for them

Quote.Author: Ben Carson
Quote.QuoteValue: Economics is not brain surgery

Quote.Author: Ben Carson
Quote.QuoteValue: If God thinks proportionality is fair who are we to say that it is unfair?

Quote.Author: Ben Carson
Quote.QuoteValue: Corporations are not in business to be social-welfare organizations; they are there to make money

Quote.Author: Ben Carson
Quote.QuoteValue: I was definitely an at-risk kid growing up

Quote.Author: Ben Carson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no job more important than parenting. This I believe

Quote.Author: Ben Carson
Quote.QuoteValue: When I look at the human brain I'm still in awe of it

Quote.Author: Ben Carson
Quote.QuoteValue: I serve God, and my purpose is to please Him, and if God be for you, who can be against you?

Quote.Author: Ben Carson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no one that we can afford to throw away

Quote.Author: Ben Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really looking forward to, not more of the same, but a continual growth

Quote.Author: Ben Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: If I fall, I fall. I'll rise up like anybody else

Quote.Author: Ben Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I get diminishing returns when I bore myself in an interview

Quote.Author: Ben Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: Genetics do play a role in how you consciously or subconsciously manifest your true self

Quote.Author: Ben Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: You're definitely a different person at different stages in your life

Quote.Author: Ben Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I think to talk too much about music almost cheapens it

Quote.Author: Ben Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: Folk is bare bones music

Quote.Author: Ben Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: My main concern when travelling around the world is finding a place to skateboard!

Quote.Author: Ben Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I really feel like the sky is the limit with the Innocent Criminals today

Quote.Author: Ben Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to do what you believe in

Quote.Author: Ben Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Often any decision, even the wrong decision, is better than no decision

Quote.Author: Ben Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: People say the most important thing is building a world-class team

Quote.Author: Ben Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to help people with management stuff a lot

Quote.Author: Ben Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Business ends up being very dynamic and situational

Quote.Author: Ben Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: In Silicon Valley, when you're a private company, the entrepreneur can do no wrong

Quote.Author: Ben Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge believer in clarity

Quote.Author: Ben Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: In a company, hundreds of decisions get made, but objectives and goals are thin

Quote.Author: Ben Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody knows how to be a CEO. It's something you have to learn. It's a very lonely job

Quote.Author: Ben Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: Every employee in a company depends on the C.E.O. to make fast, high-quality decisions

Quote.Author: Ben Horowitz
Quote.QuoteValue: As a company grows, communication becomes its biggest challenge

Quote.Author: Ben Jonson
Quote.QuoteValue: True happiness consists not in the multitude of friends, but in the worth and choice

Quote.Author: Ben Jonson
Quote.QuoteValue: Good men are the stars, the planets of the ages wherein they live, and illustrate the times

Quote.Author: Ben Jonson
Quote.QuoteValue: To speak and to speak well, are two things. A fool may talk, but a wise man speaks

Quote.Author: Ben Jonson
Quote.QuoteValue: Language most shows a man, speak that I may see thee

Quote.Author: Ben Jonson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no greater hell than to be a prisoner of fear

Quote.Author: Ben Jonson
Quote.QuoteValue: Apes are apes, though clothed in scarlet

Quote.Author: Ben Jonson
Quote.QuoteValue: In small proportions we just beauties see; And in short measures, life may perfect be

Quote.Author: Ben Jonson
Quote.QuoteValue: Talking and eloquence are not the same: to speak, and to speak well, are two things

Quote.Author: Ben Jonson
Quote.QuoteValue: I do honour the very flea of his dog

Quote.Author: Ben Jonson
Quote.QuoteValue: He threatens many that hath injured one

Quote.Author: Ben Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: If your best friend has stolen your girlfriend, it does become life and death

Quote.Author: Ben Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: Movie magic is movie magic and acting magic is acting magic

Quote.Author: Ben Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: There's so much crap talked about acting

Quote.Author: Ben Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: I try and reduce myself to an almost blank slate and hope to God that I am creative

Quote.Author: Ben Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: In cinema, the leading player is the director

Quote.Author: Ben Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: As an actor there's no autonomy, unless you're prepared to risk the possibility of starving

Quote.Author: Ben Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: There have not been any troughs as regards my work. There's never been a trough of my assurance

Quote.Author: Ben Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't honestly think people know what acting is

Quote.Author: Ben Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: The hierarchy of class in London was rigid. It was like a religion. It still is to a certain extent

Quote.Author: Ben Kingsley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very in love with the fact that the camera is revolted by acting and loves behaviour

Quote.Author: Ben Okri
Quote.QuoteValue: Magic becomes art when it has nothing to hide

Quote.Author: Ben Okri
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned that life will go through changes - up and down and up again. It's what life does

Quote.Author: Ben Okri
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics is the art of the possible; creativity is the art of the impossible

Quote.Author: Ben Okri
Quote.QuoteValue: To anyone who is homeless, I say, find a home

Quote.Author: Ben Okri
Quote.QuoteValue: To sustain your belief through situations that completely undermine it is quite something

Quote.Author: Ben Okri
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest religions convert the world through stories

Quote.Author: Ben Okri
Quote.QuoteValue: Stories can conquer fear, you know. They can make the heart bigger

Quote.Author: Ben Okri
Quote.QuoteValue: I know that human beings are capable of anything

Quote.Author: Ben Okri
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not fighting for success, just to get more beauty out of myself and share it with more people

Quote.Author: Ben Okri
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot come to a Nigerian restaurant without having pepper soup

Quote.Author: Ben Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: Every soul deserves a shot at a Cadillac, but not everyone should be guaranteed a Cadillac

Quote.Author: Ben Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like the sound of all the lists he's making

Quote.Author: Ben Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: It's amazing what ordinary people can do if they set out without preconceived notions

Quote.Author: Ben Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: You can do what you think you can do and you cannot do what you think you cannot

Quote.Author: Ben Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: The human spirit needs to accomplish, to achieve, to triumph to be happy

Quote.Author: Ben Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: Somewhere there is a map of how it can be done

Quote.Author: Ben Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't stand the heat, don't go to Cancun in the summer

Quote.Author: Ben Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is not believing that God can. It is knowing that God will

Quote.Author: Ben Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: The first step to getting the things you want out of life is this: Decide what you want

Quote.Author: Ben Stein
Quote.QuoteValue: It means zero to be against greed

Quote.Author: Ben Zobrist
Quote.QuoteValue: Each new day has a different shape to it. You just roll with it

Quote.Author: Ben Zobrist
Quote.QuoteValue: You just want the highs to start once the playoffs start

Quote.Author: Ben Zobrist
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew all the right Bible answers and the Sunday school answers

Quote.Author: Ben Zobrist
Quote.QuoteValue: The best things happen when you're not overthinking it

Quote.Author: Ben Zobrist
Quote.QuoteValue: Outfield to infield is the most jarring because in the outfield, you have much more time to throw

Quote.Author: Ben Zobrist
Quote.QuoteValue: Anytime you put your mind on the results, you lose something in the moment

Quote.Author: Ben Zobrist
Quote.QuoteValue: We've got to win a championship and bring a World Series trophy back to Chicago

Quote.Author: Ben Zobrist
Quote.QuoteValue: You just have to keep grinding

Quote.Author: Ben Zobrist
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a cleanup hitter. I'm just batting fourth

Quote.Author: Ben Zobrist
Quote.QuoteValue: The more I spend at one position, the more I can dive into those details

Quote.Author: Benedict Cumberbatch
Quote.QuoteValue: Enjoy the journey of life and not just the endgame

Quote.Author: Benedict Cumberbatch
Quote.QuoteValue: The more charming person is the person who admits the other person is more charming

Quote.Author: Benedict Cumberbatch
Quote.QuoteValue: Lines are very difficult to learn

Quote.Author: Benedict Cumberbatch
Quote.QuoteValue: Mystique is rare now, isn't it? There aren't that many enigmas in this modern world

Quote.Author: Benedict Cumberbatch
Quote.QuoteValue: I love doing impersonations of people

Quote.Author: Benedict Cumberbatch
Quote.QuoteValue: Having your adolescence at an all-male boarding school is just crap

Quote.Author: Benedict Cumberbatch
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a posh actor in England you cannot escape the class-typing from whatever side you look at it

Quote.Author: Benedict Cumberbatch
Quote.QuoteValue: We all want to escape our circumstances, don't we? Especially if you are an actor

Quote.Author: Benedict Cumberbatch
Quote.QuoteValue: I have actual acting scars

Quote.Author: Benedict Cumberbatch
Quote.QuoteValue: Talking about class terrifies me. There is no way of winning

Quote.Author: Benigno Aquino III
Quote.QuoteValue: With proper governance, life will improve for all

Quote.Author: Benigno Aquino III
Quote.QuoteValue: Strategic partnership is based on a shared set of values

Quote.Author: Benigno Aquino III
Quote.QuoteValue: Although I was born to famous parents, I know and feel the problems of ordinary citizens

Quote.Author: Benigno Aquino III
Quote.QuoteValue: I think President Obama, like myself, is a multitasker

Quote.Author: Benigno Aquino III
Quote.QuoteValue: The message has to be sent that if you commit a crime there has to be punishment

Quote.Author: Benigno Aquino III
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to make democracy work not only for the rich and the well connected but for everyone

Quote.Author: Benigno Aquino III
Quote.QuoteValue: I will not only not steal, but I will run after thieves

Quote.Author: Benigno Aquino III
Quote.QuoteValue: The people want to go back to the time when democracy was in full bloom

Quote.Author: Benigno Aquino III
Quote.QuoteValue: The United States is a key ally, a strategic partner, and a reliable friend of the Philippines

Quote.Author: Benigno Aquino III
Quote.QuoteValue: Mom's paintings are a very small part of the legacy she left behind

Quote.Author: Benito Mussolini
Quote.QuoteValue: It's good to trust others but, not to do so is much better

Quote.Author: Benito Mussolini
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us have a dagger between our teeth, a bomb in our hands, and an infinite scorn in our hearts

Quote.Author: Benito Mussolini
Quote.QuoteValue: Every anarchist is a baffled dictator

Quote.Author: Benito Mussolini
Quote.QuoteValue: Fascism is a religion. The twentieth century will be known in history as the century of Fascism

Quote.Author: Benito Mussolini
Quote.QuoteValue: The best blood will at some time get into a fool or a mosquito

Quote.Author: Benito Mussolini
Quote.QuoteValue: Socialism is a fraud, a comedy, a phantom, a blackmail

Quote.Author: Benito Mussolini
Quote.QuoteValue: Democracy is beautiful in theory; in practice it is a fallacy

Quote.Author: Benito Mussolini
Quote.QuoteValue: All within the state, nothing outside the state, nothing against the state

Quote.Author: Benito Mussolini
Quote.QuoteValue: The League is very well when sparrows shout, but no good at all when eagles fall out

Quote.Author: Benito Mussolini
Quote.QuoteValue: The function of a citizen and a soldier are inseparable

Quote.Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote.QuoteValue: Like all great travellers, I have seen more than I remember, and remember more than I have seen

Quote.Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote.QuoteValue: Never complain and never explain

Quote.Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote.QuoteValue: Seeing much, suffering much, and studying much, are the three pillars of learning

Quote.Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote.QuoteValue: Little things affect little minds

Quote.Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage is fire, and bullying is smoke

Quote.Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret of success is constancy to purpose

Quote.Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote.QuoteValue: To be conscious that you are ignorant of the facts is a great step to knowledge

Quote.Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret of success is to be ready when your opportunity comes

Quote.Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote.QuoteValue: Power has only one duty - to secure the social welfare of the People

Quote.Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote.QuoteValue: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure

Quote.Author: Benjamin Netanyahu
Quote.QuoteValue: Some will criticize me no matter what I do

Quote.Author: Benjamin Netanyahu
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't point a pistol at our own forehead. That is not the way to conduct negotiations

Quote.Author: Benjamin Netanyahu
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a proud member of the rabble

Quote.Author: Benjamin Netanyahu
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that a strong Israel is the only Israel that will bring the Arabs to the peace table

Quote.Author: Benjamin Netanyahu
Quote.QuoteValue: I always lose the election in the polls, and I always win it on election day

Quote.Author: Benjamin Netanyahu
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I'm just not going to get into American politics

Quote.Author: Benjamin Netanyahu
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no one in Israel who appreciates more than me the importance of American support for Israel

Quote.Author: Benjamin Netanyahu
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have people chanting 'Death to America' in Israel

Quote.Author: Benjamin Netanyahu
Quote.QuoteValue: My level of intervention in the press, trying to control stories, is zero. Subzero

Quote.Author: Benjamin Netanyahu
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been right more than I've been wrong

Quote.Author: Benjamin Spock
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust yourself, you know more than you think you do

Quote.Author: Benjamin Spock
Quote.QuoteValue: You know more than you think you do

Quote.Author: Benjamin Spock
Quote.QuoteValue: There are only two things a child will share willingly; communicable diseases and its mother's age

Quote.Author: Benjamin Spock
Quote.QuoteValue: The child supplies the power but the parents have to do the steering

Quote.Author: Benjamin Spock
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is mostly a by-product of doing what makes us feel fulfilled

Quote.Author: Benjamin Spock
Quote.QuoteValue: To win in Vietnam, we will have to exterminate a nation

Quote.Author: Benjamin Spock
Quote.QuoteValue: When women are encouraged to be competitive, too many of them become disagreeable

Quote.Author: Benjamin Spock
Quote.QuoteValue: I was proud of the youths who opposed the war in Vietnam because they were my babies

Quote.Author: Benjamin Spock
Quote.QuoteValue: Preschool children are virtuosos of imagination

Quote.Author: Benjamin Spock
Quote.QuoteValue: On the average, older parents are more flexible, tolerant, understanding, and happy in child care

Quote.Author: Benjamin Tucker
Quote.QuoteValue: But this is not to say that the society which inflicts capital punishment commits murder

Quote.Author: Benjamin Tucker
Quote.QuoteValue: But which is the State's essential function, aggression or defence, few seem to know or care

Quote.Author: Benjamin Tucker
Quote.QuoteValue: The moment that justice must be paid for by the victim of injustice it becomes itself injustice

Quote.Author: Benjamin Tucker
Quote.QuoteValue: We are here, on earth. Not one of us has any right to the earth

Quote.Author: Benjamin Tucker
Quote.QuoteValue: Capitalism is at least tolerable, which cannot be said of Socialism or Communism

Quote.Author: Benjamin Tucker
Quote.QuoteValue: Aggression is simply another name for government

Quote.Author: Benjamin Tucker
Quote.QuoteValue: The essence of government is control, or the attempt to control

Quote.Author: Benjamin Tucker
Quote.QuoteValue: Murder is an offensive act. The term cannot be applied legitimately to any defensive act

Quote.Author: Benjamin Tucker
Quote.QuoteValue: Such security is equal liberty. But it is not necessarily equality in the use of the earth

Quote.Author: Benjamin Tucker
Quote.QuoteValue: The cost of justice can be justly paid only by the invader

Quote.Author: Benny Hinn
Quote.QuoteValue: Do you know that every unbeliever is filled with a demon spirit?

Quote.Author: Benny Hinn
Quote.QuoteValue: Where in the Bible does it say I have to drive a Honda?

Quote.Author: Benny Hinn
Quote.QuoteValue: Adam was a super-being when God created him

Quote.Author: Benny Hinn
Quote.QuoteValue: The day is coming when there will not be one sick saint in the body of Christ

Quote.Author: Benny Hinn
Quote.QuoteValue: God sent Jesus as an example to see if we could retain and maintain the Holy Spirit in human flesh

Quote.Author: Benny Hinn
Quote.QuoteValue: We receive by faith and we keep it by faith

Quote.Author: Benny Hinn
Quote.QuoteValue: No, I'm not wealthy

Quote.Author: Benny Hinn
Quote.QuoteValue: I can tell you this, if it wasn't for my book royalties, I'd be in debt

Quote.Author: Benny Hinn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an open book

Quote.Author: Benny Hinn
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not been a pleasant life

Quote.Author: Berkeley Breathed
Quote.QuoteValue: It's never too late to have a happy childhood

Quote.Author: Berkeley Breathed
Quote.QuoteValue: Despite what they tell you, there are simply no moral absolutes in a complex world

Quote.Author: Berkeley Breathed
Quote.QuoteValue: I ignore Hallmark Holidays. And this comes from a guy who has sold a million Opus greeting cards

Quote.Author: Berkeley Breathed
Quote.QuoteValue: If nothing is serious anymore, then there's nothing to satirize

Quote.Author: Berkeley Breathed
Quote.QuoteValue: Cartooning is about deconstruction: you gotta tear something down to make a joke

Quote.Author: Berkeley Breathed
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Harry Potter' shouldn't be children's first experience with suspense and plot turns

Quote.Author: Berkeley Breathed
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of us find our lives abridged even before the paperback comes out

Quote.Author: Berkeley Breathed
Quote.QuoteValue: The comic page is dying; I didn't want to go with it

Quote.Author: Berkeley Breathed
Quote.QuoteValue: I started as a news photographer at the University Of Texas' Daily Texan

Quote.Author: Berkeley Breathed
Quote.QuoteValue: My post-child period resulted in one instant change: I write shorter books for kids

Quote.Author: Bernard Baruch
Quote.QuoteValue: To me - old age is always ten years older than I am

Quote.Author: Bernard Baruch
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of the successful people I've known are the ones who do more listening than talking

Quote.Author: Bernard Baruch
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us not deceive ourselves; we must elect world peace or world destruction

Quote.Author: Bernard Baruch
Quote.QuoteValue: We did not all come over on the same ship, but we are all in the same boat

Quote.Author: Bernard Baruch
Quote.QuoteValue: Two things are bad for the heart - running up stairs and running down people

Quote.Author: Bernard Baruch
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't try to buy at the bottom and sell at the top. It can't be done except by liars

Quote.Author: Bernard Baruch
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, old age is always fifteen years older than I am

Quote.Author: Bernard Baruch
Quote.QuoteValue: Millions saw the apple fall, but Newton was the one who asked why

Quote.Author: Bernard Baruch
Quote.QuoteValue: Vote for the man who promises least; he'll be the least disappointing

Quote.Author: Bernard Baruch
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not blame anybody for your mistakes and failures

Quote.Author: Bernard Sumner
Quote.QuoteValue: If you choose to take a path in life, don't blame other people for the path you've chosen to take

Quote.Author: Bernard Sumner
Quote.QuoteValue: I like a challenge. I like learning new skills because I didn't learn much at school

Quote.Author: Bernard Sumner
Quote.QuoteValue: Part of the reason I joined Joy Division was so that I really wouldn't have to grow up

Quote.Author: Bernard Sumner
Quote.QuoteValue: Joy Division sounded like Manchester: cold, sparse and, at times, bleak

Quote.Author: Bernard Sumner
Quote.QuoteValue: I see all the musicians in Blur with equal standing, really

Quote.Author: Bernard Sumner
Quote.QuoteValue: The drummer is the backbone of the band and is the real underrated one

Quote.Author: Bernard Sumner
Quote.QuoteValue: Landscape affects you

Quote.Author: Bernard Sumner
Quote.QuoteValue: I saw the Sex Pistols, and they were terrible

Quote.Author: Bernard Sumner
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't see yourself in the same way other people see you

Quote.Author: Bernard Sumner
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't escape from yourself, can you?

Quote.Author: Bernard Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope

Quote.Author: Bernard Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent is a flame. Genius is a fire

Quote.Author: Bernard Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the word 'indolence'. It makes my laziness seem classy

Quote.Author: Bernard Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no psychiatrist in the world like a puppy licking your face

Quote.Author: Bernard Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Man never made any material as resilient as the human spirit

Quote.Author: Bernard Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: We may pass violets looking for roses. We may pass contentment looking for victory

Quote.Author: Bernard Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: What a strange world this would be if we all had the same sense of humor

Quote.Author: Bernard Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: If a June night could talk, it would probably boast it invented romance

Quote.Author: Bernard Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Books had instant replay long before televised sports

Quote.Author: Bernard Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Few things are as democratic as a snowstorm

Quote.Author: Bernie Mac
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't build myself by beating somebody down

Quote.Author: Bernie Mac
Quote.QuoteValue: I love who I am. I love what I've become

Quote.Author: Bernie Mac
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever success I've had, I always like to top it

Quote.Author: Bernie Mac
Quote.QuoteValue: My comedy comes from pain. I can't stand to see someone hurting

Quote.Author: Bernie Mac
Quote.QuoteValue: Bernie Mac don't sugarcoat

Quote.Author: Bernie Mac
Quote.QuoteValue: If I can tell someone a story that makes them bend over and laugh, that's bigger than anything else

Quote.Author: Bernie Mac
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the whole key to anything: Don't be afraid to fail. And Bernie Mac is not afraid to fail

Quote.Author: Bernie Mac
Quote.QuoteValue: My humor had changed from foolishness to making sense

Quote.Author: Bernie Mac
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so black, I leave fingerprints on coal

Quote.Author: Bernie Mac
Quote.QuoteValue: My daughter was a beautiful child

Quote.Author: Bernie Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: The goal of real healthcare reform must be high-quality, universal coverage in a cost-effective way

Quote.Author: Bernie Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: One in four corporations doesn't pay any taxes

Quote.Author: Bernie Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: I see a future where getting to work or to school or to the store does not have to cause pollution

Quote.Author: Bernie Sanders
Quote.QuoteValue: The U.S. constitution is an extraordinary document. In my view, it should not be amended often
